column1: Zhashkiv (Ukrainian: Жашків [ˈʒɑʃkiu̯]) is a city in Cherkasy Oblast (province) of Ukraine. It is the administrative center of Zhashkiv Raion. Population: 13
A local newspaper is published here since September 1931.City since 1956.
In 1989 the population of the city was 16 484 peopleIn 2013 the population of the city was 14 234 peopleThe parents of Moshe Dayan were originally from Zhashkiv.
